thread.title: Ex-Lions CB Stanley Wilson II arrested while naked - for third time
thread.title_full: Ex-Lions CB Stanley Wilson II arrested while naked - for third time

title: Ex-Lions CB Stanley Wilson II arrested while naked - for third time
text:
Ex-Lions CB Stanley Wilson II arrested while naked - for third time Wilson II had been shot by a homeowner in June 2016 in a similar incident, then arrested January when found naked Post to Facebook Ex-Lions CB Stanley Wilson II arrested while naked - for third time Wilson II had been shot by a homeowner in June 2016 in a similar incident, then arrested January when found naked  //on.freep.com/2lwTTpf   1   Ex-Lions CB Stanley Wilson II arrested while naked - for third time Associated Press 1:07 p.m. ET Feb. 19, 2017 Wilson II had been shot by a homeowner in June 2016 in a similar incident, then arrested January when found naked outside a residence in Portland Stanley Wilson II stands during a hearing June 30, 2016, in Multnomah County Circuit Court in Portland, Ore. (Photo: Francesca Fontana, Associated Press) 3 CONNECT 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
WOODBURN, Ore. — Police say they arrested a former NFL player after he tried to force his way into an Oregon home and then took his clothes off. 
Police went to the Woodburn home on Saturday after being told someone was making alarming statements. 
The homeowner told authorities that former Detroit Lions cornerback Stanley Wilson II was acting erratically and tried to get into the house. 
Past incidents: Ex-Lion Stanley Wilson, found naked, shot, says he’s happy to be alive 
Arriving officers say Wilson emerged from a backyard shed and was naked. He was taken to Marion County Jail. 
Police spokesman Jason Horton says he didn't know if Wilson had a lawyer. No lawyer was included on his jail listing and the prosecutor's office was closed Sunday. 
Police say Wilson had been shot by a homeowner in June in a similar incident in Portland and was arrested in January when he was found naked outside a residence in Portland. 3 CONNECT 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE
